show_name: Legend of the Black Eye - Kokudohoh (OAV)
other_title: Kokudo Oh: The Black Eye King
The Legend of the Maids: May and Belle
メイド伝説～メル＆ベルの淫靡な誘い～ 黒瞳皇 (Japanese)
plot: Isheildo is a young prince of the small country of Bosarre. Two larger nations that border Bosarre have sent their princesses to stay with Isheildo for one and a half months, hoping to gain more political power by having him marry one of them. Both are desparate for some kind of alliance, and have to allow Isheildo one and a half months to decide whether he will marry Bellshil (of the east country of Rohan), or Ariel (of the West country of Gerod). Both princesses are desparate to win him over, and of course, will go to any lengths to ensure the diplomatic relationship can be formed.
